snippet: Germany's Christmas shopping season started well - suggesting a bounce-back in Europe's biggest economy is continuing - with electronics, homeware and food selling particularly strongly, the German retail association (HDE) said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: German Retailers Happy With Start to Christmas Shopping Season
headline.main: German Retailers Happy With Start to Christmas Shopping Season

lead_paragraph: Germany's Christmas shopping season started well - suggesting a bounce-back in Europe's biggest economy is continuing - with electronics, homeware and food selling particularly strongly, the German retail association (HDE) said on Sunday.
